title: Le Crobag
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Take-out, Bakery, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain bakery branch; this outlet is mainly a take-away with a very small seating area in the food court of the train station. Sells baked goods, sandwiches, and hot drinks. Offers vegan baguettes filled with either tofu, basil and tomato, or herb spread and cucumber.
